column4: hey why don'yt i see my partitions icons in Places-Computer when using Edgy?
GNOME may not have updated yet then
When I mount stuff GNOME doesn't notice.
If you need to access them just go to where you mounted them
Giving a file root access? o.o
i'm not accessing windows shares, i'm accessing linux shares
i tried using the "network servers" link in nautilus but i get nothing
you're accessing linux shares from linux? or linux shares from windows?
you need to use smbfs then
i installed the sharing services (NFS + SMB), but how do i access my ubuntu shares using the GUI ?
again, you need to mount them using smbfs
just google "smbfs on ubuntu" or something
